shows.title: J.P. Bimeni & The Black Belts
shows.desc: “Music is a way for me to forget” – and some have more to forget than others. J.P. Bimeni fled Burundi's civil war after three attempts on his life, landing in Wales as a teenager. Possessed of a sweet soul voice conjuring up echoes of Curtis Mayfield and Roland Gift, J.P. teamed up with the Black Belts in 2017.
